title: Carboxyl-functionalized two-dimensional MXene–Au nanocomposites were prepared as SERS substrates for the detection of melamine in dairy products
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,14041-14050
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02249A, Paper

In the present study, we address the limitations of conventional surface-enhanced Raman scattering (SERS) techniques for sensitive and stable detection of melamine in food products, especially dairy.
